类的使用
com.view.XListView.PullToRefreshBase

  • 使用PullToRefreshBase的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    com.view.XListView  

    • com.view.XListView中PullToRefreshBase的使用

      com.view.XListView中PullToRefreshBase的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  PullToRefreshAdapterViewBase<T extends AbsListView> 
      class  PullToRefreshGridView 
      class  PullToRefreshListView 
      class  PullToRefreshScrollView 
      class  PullToRefreshWebView 
      参数类型为PullToRefreshBase的com.view.XListView中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void PullToRefreshBase.OnRefreshListener2.onPullDownToRefresh(PullToRefreshBase<V> refreshView)
      onPullDownToRefresh will be called only when the user has Pulled from the start, and released.
      void PullToRefreshBase.OnPullEventListener.onPullEvent(PullToRefreshBase<V> refreshView, PullToRefreshBase.State state, PullToRefreshBase.Mode direction)
      Called when the internal state has been changed, usually by the user pulling.
      void PullToRefreshBase.OnRefreshListener2.onPullUpToRefresh(PullToRefreshBase<V> refreshView)
      onPullUpToRefresh will be called only when the user has Pulled from the end, and released.
      void PullToRefreshBase.OnRefreshListener.onRefresh(PullToRefreshBase<V> refreshView)
      onRefresh will be called for both a Pull from start, and Pull from end
      static void OverscrollHelper.overScrollBy(PullToRefreshBase<?> view, int deltaX, int scrollX, int deltaY, int scrollY, boolean isTouchEvent)
      Helper method for Overscrolling that encapsulates all of the necessary function.
      static void OverscrollHelper.overScrollBy(PullToRefreshBase<?> view, int deltaX, int scrollX, int deltaY, int scrollY, int scrollRange, boolean isTouchEvent)
      Helper method for Overscrolling that encapsulates all of the necessary function.
      static void OverscrollHelper.overScrollBy(PullToRefreshBase<?> view, int deltaX, int scrollX, int deltaY, int scrollY, int scrollRange, int fuzzyThreshold, float scaleFactor, boolean isTouchEvent)
      Helper method for Overscrolling that encapsulates all of the necessary function.
